name: chi_squared_test
description: Perform a chi-squared test on two categorical columns from a data file.

file_path.description: Path to the data file (.csv, .xlsx, .json, or .jsonl).

sheet_name.description: Sheet name or index (for Excel files). Optional for non-Excel files.

col1.description: First categorical column for the contingency table.

col2.description: Second categorical column for the contingency table.
